code: @Override protected JndiRegistry createRegistry() throws Exception {     JndiRegistry jndi = super.createRegistry().     jndi.bind("site", "help site\nhelp site").     return jndi. }

@Test public void testSiteCommands() throws Exception {     sendFile(getFtpUrl(), "Hello World", "hello.txt").     File file = new File(FTP_ROOT_DIR + "/site/hello.txt").     assertTrue("The uploaded file should exists", file.exists()).     assertEquals("Hello World", IOConverter.toString(file, null)). }
